sn35.72:1.1: “Yo hi koci, bhikkhave, bhikkhu channam phassayatananam samudayanca atthangamanca assadanca adinavanca nissarananca yathabhutam nappajanati.
sn35.72:1.2: Avusitam tena brahmacariyam, araka so imasma dhammavinaya”ti.
sn35.72:2.1: Evam vutte, annataro bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn35.72:2.3: Ahanhi, bhante, channam phassayatananam samudayanca atthangamanca assadanca adinavanca nissarananca yathabhutam nappajanami”ti.
sn35.72:3.2: cakkhum ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti samanupassasi”ti?
sn35.72:5.1: “Sadhu, bhikkhu, ettha ca te, bhikkhu, cakkhu ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi na meso atta’ti evametam yathabhutam sammappannaya sudittham bhavissati.
sn35.72:5.2: Evam te etam pathamam phassayatanam pahinam bhavissati ayatim apunabbhavaya …pe….
sn35.72:6.1: “Jivham ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti samanupassasi”ti?
sn35.72:8.1: “Sadhu, bhikkhu, ettha ca te, bhikkhu, jivha ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi na meso atta’ti evametam yathabhutam sammappannaya sudittham bhavissati. Evam te etam catuttham phassayatanam pahinam bhavissati ayatim apunabbhavaya …pe….
sn35.72:9.1: “Manam ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti samanupassasi”ti?
sn35.72:11.1: “Sadhu, bhikkhu, ettha ca te, bhikkhu, mano ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti evametam yathabhutam sammappannaya sudittham bhavissati.
sn35.72:11.2: Evam te etam chattham phassayatanam pahinam bhavissati ayatim apunabbhavaya”ti.
